title: FastMCP Agent Boilerplate
excerpt: A simple end-to-end agent application built with Python that integrates FastMCP to perform calculator tasks using any OpenAI-compatible LLM provider.

title: MonoLLM - Unified interface for multiple LLM providers
excerpt: A powerful framework that provides a unified interface for multiple LLM providers, allowing developers to seamlessly switch between different AI models while maintaining consistent API interactions.

title: Omnichat - All-in-One LLM Chat Application
excerpt: A versatile chat application that allows you to interact with various Large Language Models (OpenAI, Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, Deepseek, Alibaba Qwen) from different providers, all within a single, intuitive interface. Available as both a web application and a native desktop app built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and Tauri.

title: LLM Agent Webapp
excerpt: A minimal agentic LLM web app built with Next.js 15 (App Router), featuring a chat interface and a visual workflow editor for AI agent flows.

title: Company Website Template
excerpt: A template for building a modern company website using Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. It includes features for managing content like blogs and news articles via Markdown files.
